slieb.kute.api

Interface Resource.Readable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Resource, Resource.Checksumable, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ContentResource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BytesArrayResource, CachedResource, FileResource, InputStreamResource, MutableBytesArrayResource, RenamedPathResource, StringSupplierResource, URLResource
    Enclosing interface:
    Resource

    public static interface Resource.Readable
extends Resource, Resource.Checksumable, Serializable
    Represents a readable resource. Provides getReader() and getInputStream() methods to read the resource with.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface slieb.kute.api.Resource

        Resource.Checksumable, Resource.Creator, Resource.Provider, Resource.Readable, Resource.Writable

    • Method Detail

      • getReader

        default Reader getReader()
                  throws IOException
        Returns:
        A reader that will give you the contents of resource.
        Throws:
        IOException - an IO exception.

      • getInputStream

        InputStream getInputStream()
                    throws IOException

        Returns a inputStream for the resource.

        
      Resource.InputStreaming resource = ...;
      try(InputStream intputStream = resource.getInputStream()) {
          // .. do stuff with intputStream
      }
        Returns:
        A inputStream that will read from resource.
        Throws:
        IOException - when there is an exception creating the InputStream.
